main event: A civil airline pilot observed what he thought was a meteor fall into the sea near Little Saba.
interesting points: The object was reported to be descending at high speed into the water,The pilot stated the object lit up the sky with a red haze effect,There was no indication of the object breaking up, making it unusual for a typical meteor,Another flight in the area reported a ship in proximity to the sighting,The duration of the observation was 9 minutes.
